thread.title: Bethany & Sam Will Host 'Project Heal' Annual Gala
thread.title_full: Bethany & Sam Will Host 'Project Heal' Annual Gala

title: Bethany & Sam Will Host 'Project Heal' Annual Gala

organizations.name: bethany & sam will host 'project heal' annual gala bethany & sam will host 'project heal' annual gala

text:
Bethany & Sam Will Host 'Project Heal' Annual Gala posted by Elvis   On May 16th, our very own Bethany & Sam will be hosting their 9th annual gala! 
Project HEAL: Help to Eat, Accept and Live was founded by 15-year-olds Liana and Kristina in 2008- they met while undergoing treatment for anorexia at only 13! Almost 10 years later , they are on Forbes List of "30 Under 30" as social entrepreneurs, and are now the largest nonprofit organization in the U.S.! 
They deliver prevention, treatment financing, and recovery support for those suffering. Treatment is very expensive and insurance is severely lacking, but with 40 chapters in the U.S., Canada, United Kingdom, and Australia, these girls are making a real difference in the world of recovery! 
This year Bethany and Sam will be hosting the 9th annual gala on May 16th ! There will be a performance by Pentatonix, and the honoree guest is Lilly Collins. Tickets are available to join!
